title: [URGENT] Week 0 Script: 0.1 Introduction to Climate Science
description: Write 12-min script for introductory climate science lesson. Include hook, learning objectives, 3-4 content segments, summary, transition. Target: 1500-2000 words. DUE: Jan 17 EOD

title: [URGENT] Week 0 Script: 0.2 Greenhouse Effect and Carbon Cycle
description: Write 15-min script. Include greenhouse effect mechanisms, carbon cycle dynamics, Thailand context. Target: 2000-2500 words. DUE: Jan 17 EOD

title: Refinery Patrol
description: Merge queue processor patrol loop with verification gates.

title: Witness Patrol
description: Per-rig worker monitor patrol loop with progressive nudging.

title: [URGENT] Week 0 Script: 0.3 Climate Indicators and Measurements
description: Write 12-min script on climate monitoring, indicators, measurement techniques. Include ASEAN examples. Target: 1500-2000 words. DUE: Jan 17 EOD

title: [URGENT] Week 0 Script: 0.5 Course Overview and Expectations
description: Write 10-min script on course structure, learning outcomes, Commitment Week requirements, assessment overview. Target: 1300-1700 words. DUE: Jan 17 EOD

title: [URGENT] Commitment Quiz Design
description: Create 15 MCQ questions covering all Week 0 content. 70% passing threshold. Include plausible distractors, explanations. Must be challenging but fair for PhD students. DUE: Jan 17 EOD

title: [URGENT] Week 0 Script: 0.4 Why Climate Policy Matters
description: Write 10-min script on policy importance, real-world impacts, Thailand policy landscape. Target: 1300-1700 words. DUE: Jan 17 EOD
